text: Clubul Sportiv Rapid București, commonly known as CS Rapid București, Rapid București, or simply Rapid, is a Romanian basketball club based in Bucharest, currently participates in the Liga Națională, the top-tier league in Romania. The team represents the basketball men's section of CS Rapid București, a multi-sports club. Rapid won a national title in 1951 and finished three times third, in 1961, 1964 and 1983, but in the last years played mostly in the second-tier Liga I.Sectia baschet masculin. clubulrapid.ro However, in 2018 the league was merged with the top-tier Liga Națională.Cum va arăta Liga Națională de Baschet Masculin sezonul viitor. totalbaschet.ro ==Honours== *Liga Națională :15pxChampions (1): 1951 ==Current roster== ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Sport in Bucharest Category:1934 establishments in Romania Category:Basketball teams in Romania Category:Basketball teams established in 1934
title: CS Rapid București (men's basketball)
